body:
Apple (AAPL) : In a disclosure report filed on Jan 24, 2017, The Wealth Management company Reilly Financial Advisors said it has reduced its stake by selling shares in Apple by 7.26% during the most recent quarter end. The investment management company now holds a total of 121,978 shares of Apple in its fund, which is valued at $14,647,118 after selling 9,554 shares in Apple. Apple makes up approximately 2.49% of Reilly Financial Advisors’s portfolio.

Other Asset Management firms and mutual funds Sell and Buy Stocks to adjust their portfolio based on the Investoment strategies.Asset Management firm, Ami Asset Management Corp reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 27,857 shares or 7.66% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 335,865 shares of AAPL which is valued at $40,330,669. Apple makes up approx 2.94% of Ami Asset Management Corp’s portfolio.Taylor Wealth Management Partners boosted its stake in AAPL in the latest quarter, The investment management firm added 12,888 additional shares and now holds a total of 58,100 shares of Apple which is valued at $6,972,000. Apple makes up approx 3.17% of Taylor Wealth Management Partners’s portfolio.Atria Investments boosted its stake in AAPL in the latest quarter, The investment management firm added 13,783 additional shares and now holds a total of 98,819 shares of Apple which is valued at $11,784,166. Apple makes up approx 0.89% of Atria Investments’s portfolio.Wealthcare Capital Management boosted its stake in AAPL in the latest quarter, The investment management firm added 202 additional shares and now holds a total of 2,118 shares of Apple which is valued at $253,631. Apple makes up approx 0.03% of Wealthcare Capital Management’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Catawba Capital Management Va reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 6,254 shares or 4.07% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 147,504 shares of AAPL which is valued at $17,663,604. Apple makes up approx 4.08% of Catawba Capital Management Va’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Filament reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 7,828 shares or 43.6% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 10,127 shares of AAPL which is valued at $1,212,708. Apple makes up approx 0.56% of Filament’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, Cohen Lawrence B reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 590 shares or 1.14% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 51,279 shares of AAPL which is valued at $6,101,688. Apple makes up approx 3.66% of Cohen Lawrence B’s portfolio.Asset Management firm, West Oak Capital reduced its stake in AAPL by selling 403 shares or 2.37% in the most recent quarter. The Hedge Fund company now holds 16,578 shares of AAPL which is valued at $1,925,535. Apple makes up approx 1.28% of West Oak Capital’s portfolio.

Several firms have issued research on Apple. Shares were Downgraded by Barclays on Jan 24, 2017 to ” Equal Weight” and Lowered the Price Target to $ 117 from a previous price target of $119 .Company shares were Reiterated by Macquarie on Jan 20, 2017 to “Outperform”, Firm has raised the Price Target to $ 148 from a previous price target of $133 .Company shares were Reiterated by BofA/Merrill on Jan 19, 2017 to “Buy”, Firm has raised the Price Target to $ 140 from a previous price target of $125 .Guggenheim Initiated Apple on Jan 4, 2017 to “Buy”, Price Target of the shares are set at $140.Piper Jaffray Resumed Apple on Dec 16, 2016 to “Overweight”, Price Target of the shares are set at $155.

On the company’s financial health, Apple reported $1.67 EPS for the quarter, beating the analyst consensus estimate by $ 0.01 according to the earnings call on Oct 25, 2016. Analyst had a consensus of $1.66. The company had revenue of $46852.00 million for the quarter, compared to analysts expectations of $46977.40 million. The company’s revenue was down -9.0 % compared to the same quarter last year.During the same quarter in the previous year, the company posted $1.96 EPS.

In a separate transaction, on Jan 19, 2017, Timothy D Cook (Chief Executive Officer) sold 30,000 shares at 120.00 per share price.On Jan 19, 2017, Daniel J. Riccio (Senior Vice President) sold 10,942 shares at 119.99 per share price.On Jan 10, 2017, Luca Maestri (Senior Vice President, CFO) sold 4,010 shares at 117.88 per share price.

Apple opened for trading at $120 and hit $120.81 on the upside on Monday, eventually ending the session at $120.08, with a gain of 0.07% or 0.08 points. The heightened volatility saw the trading volume jump to 22,050,218 shares. Company has a market cap of $631,359 M.
title: Reilly Financial Advisors Cuts Position in Apple (AAPL) by $14,647,118 – Hignland Mirror
